summary: A teenager who gave up her spot in an elite U.S. gymnastics program when her family moved to Australia enters a competition to help a new friend.
cast: Kelli Berglund|Lili Karamalikis|Tess Fowler|Emily Morris|Peta Shannon|Jack Tomich|Caetlyn Collins|Isabelle Andary-Geslin|Adam Tuominen|Jordan Tomlienovic|Rachel D'Sena|Emma Bampton|Chloe Boucher|Lucy Southerland|Jeff Lang|Jordan Schulz|Helen Geoffreys|Jordyn Wieber|Sharon Cleary|Sarah Jeavons|Chris Koch|Rory Walker|Sophie Szew|Kim Delaney|Stephen Schofield|Jeb Silsbury|Gabe Adkins|Colin Cassidy|Jamie Hedderwick|Larrissa Miller|John Mitchell|Visali Ramanmoorthy|David John Clark|Brendan Cooney|Erin Moran
title: Las chicas de oro
